info.name: Alexa Smart Home Sample (smarthome-iot)
info.description: REST calls for the sample_backend content available on https://github.com/alexa/alexa-smarthome

item.name: Endpoints

request.description: Delete an endpoint. Send an array of endpoints to delete by endpoint ID. Passing * will delete all sample endpoints.

item.description: Methods for creating and manipulating sample Endpoints.

item.name: Events
item.description: Method for sending endpoint cloud events.
